text.section:
The political subdivisions of this State have full authority, under their respective zoning powers:
To zone areas for commercial or industrial purposes; and
In these areas, to govern the size, spacing, and lighting of outdoor signs.

Notwithstanding any provision of this part or any rule or regulation of the Administration:
Local zoning regulations that relate to outdoor signs in commercial or industrial areas shall govern within the zoned area; and
If a political subdivision adopts comprehensive zoning that includes the regulation of outdoor signs:
The Administration may so certify to the Federal Highway Administrator; and
On certification, the control of outdoor signs in commercial or industrial areas transfers to the political subdivision.
